name: scaffoldstellar
description: Fullstack Stellar smart contract and frontend boilerplate

scripts.build: yarn build:contracts && yarn workspace scaffoldstellar-frontend build
scripts.test: yarn test:contracts && yarn workspace scaffoldstellar-frontend test
scripts.post-deploy: yarn build:packages && yarn generate:contract-imports && yarn generate:metadata && node scripts/copy-deployment-files.js
scripts.optimize: cd contracts && stellar contract optimize --wasm target/wasm32v1-none/release/hello_world.wasm && stellar contract optimize --wasm target/wasm32v1-none/release/increment.wasm && stellar contract optimize --wasm target/wasm32v1-none/release/token.wasm
scripts.clean: rm -rf contracts/target deployment*.json contracts/*/test_snapshots && node scripts/clean-frontend.js
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf contracts/target deployment*.json contracts/*/test_snapshots && node scripts/clean-frontend.js && rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules

author: Scaffold Stellar Plus Team
